languages.text: "Салис Прайм по описанию очень походила на мир из древней легенды... легенды о святой Ардженте и ее корабле", {n}— в голосе сестры прорезается благоговение.{/n} "Арджента, Прижизненная Святая — это моя покровительница, в честь которой мне дали имя в Ордене. Она погибла тысячи лет назад, когда еретики заставили ее корабль упасть с небес".

"The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."
languages.original_text: "Салис Прайм по описанию очень походила на мир из древней легенды... легенды о святой Ардженте и ее корабле", {n}— в голосе сестры прорезается благоговение.{/n} "Арджента, Прижизненная Святая — это моя покровительница, в честь которой мне дали имя в Ордене. Она погибла тысячи лет назад, когда еретики заставили ее корабль упасть с небес".

traits.locale_text: "The way Salis Prime was described to me made it seem very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the Order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics made her ship fall from the skies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “萨利斯主星的情况在我听来非常耳熟。它听起来很像是某个远古传说发生的世界……关于圣阿洁塔与她的飞船的传说。”{n}她的声音变得虔诚起来。{/n}“活圣人阿洁塔是我的守护神，修会以她的圣名为我命名。几千年前，她的飞船被异端分子击落，她也不幸遇难。”
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: “萨利斯主星的情况在我听来非常耳熟。它听起来很像是某个远古传说发生的世界……关于圣阿洁塔与她的飞船的传说。”{n}她的声音变得虔诚起来。{/n}“活圣人阿洁塔是我的守护神，修会以她的圣名为我命名。几千年前，她的飞船被异端分子击落，她也不幸遇难。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La descripción de Salis Prime me resultaba familiar. Se parecía mucho al mundo de una leyenda... la leyenda de santa Argenta y su nave». {n}Su voz adquiere un tono de reverencia.{/n} «Argenta, la Santa en Vida. Es mi patrona, cuyo nombre me fue concedido por la orden. Murió hace milenios, cuando los herejes hicieron caer su nave del cielo».
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: «La descripción de Salis Prime me resultaba familiar. Se parecía mucho al mundo de una leyenda... la leyenda de santa Argenta y su nave». {n}Su voz adquiere un tono de reverencia.{/n} «Argenta, la Santa en Vida. Es mi patrona, cuyo nombre me fue concedido por la orden. Murió hace milenios, cuando los herejes hicieron caer su nave del cielo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「サリス・プライムの説明には聞き覚えがありました。古代の伝説に登場する惑星…聖アルジェンタとその船の伝説にとてもよく似ているように思えたのです」{n}彼女の声に敬虔さがつのる。{/n}「生ける聖女アルジェンタは我の守護聖女であり、教団は我を彼女にちなんで命名しました。彼女は数千年前、異端者たちのせいで船が空から落下して亡くなったのです」
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: 「サリス・プライムの説明には聞き覚えがありました。古代の伝説に登場する惑星…聖アルジェンタとその船の伝説にとてもよく似ているように思えたのです」{n}彼女の声に敬虔さがつのる。{/n}「生ける聖女アルジェンタは我の守護聖女であり、教団は我を彼女にちなんで命名しました。彼女は数千年前、異端者たちのせいで船が空から落下して亡くなったのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Beschreibung von Salis Prime kam mir bekannt vor. Sie ähnelte stark einer Welt aus einer uralten Legende ... der Legende von der Heiligen Argenta und ihrem Schiff." {n}Ihre Stimme wird ehrfurchtsvoll.{/n} "Argenta, die Lebende Heilige – sie ist meine Schutzpatronin, und der Orden hat mich nach ihr benannt. Sie starb vor Jahrtausenden, als Ketzer ihr Schiff vom Himmel abstürzen ließen."
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beschreibung von Salis Prime kam mir bekannt vor. Sie ähnelte stark einer Welt aus einer uralten Legende ... der Legende von der Heiligen Argenta und ihrem Schiff." {n}Ihre Stimme wird ehrfurchtsvoll.{/n} "Argenta, die Lebende Heilige – sie ist meine Schutzpatronin, und der Orden hat mich nach ihr benannt. Sie starb vor Jahrtausenden, als Ketzer ihr Schiff vom Himmel abstürzen ließen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La description de Salis Primus m'était familière. Elle ressemblait fortement à un monde tiré d'une vieille légende... celle de Sainte Argenta et de son vaisseau. Argenta, la Sainte Vivante, est ma patronne et l'origine du nom que l'ordre m'a donné, {n}continue-t-elle d'une voix révérencieuse.{/n} Elle est morte il y a des milliers d'années, lorsque des hérétiques ont fait tomber son vaisseau du ciel. »
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: « La description de Salis Primus m'était familière. Elle ressemblait fortement à un monde tiré d'une vieille légende... celle de Sainte Argenta et de son vaisseau. Argenta, la Sainte Vivante, est ma patronne et l'origine du nom que l'ordre m'a donné, {n}continue-t-elle d'une voix révérencieuse.{/n} Elle est morte il y a des milliers d'années, lorsque des hérétiques ont fait tomber son vaisseau du ciel. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Salis Prime'ın tasviri bana tanıdık geldi. Antik efsanelerden birinde bahsedilen bir dünyayı andırıyordu... Azize Argenta ve gemisinin efsanesindeki dünyayı." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde bir tür hürmetkârlık hissediliyor.{/n} "Yaşayan Azize Argenta, efendim ve adımı aldığım kişidir. Kardeşlik, beni bu şekilde adlandırdı. Binlerce yıl önce kâfirler, gemisine saldırıp gökten düşürdüğünde vefat etti."
languages.original_text: "The description of Salis Prime was familiar to me. It seemed very similar to a world from an ancient legend... the legend of Saint Argenta and her ship." {n}Her voice grows reverent.{/n} "Argenta, the Living Saint — she is my patroness, the order named me after her. She died millennia ago, when heretics caused her ship to fall from the skies."

traits.locale_text: "Salis Prime'ın betimlemesi bana tanıdık geldi. Antik efsanelerden birinde bahsedilen bir dünyayı andırıyordu… Azize Argenta ve gemisinin efsanesindeki dünyayı." {n}Argenta'nın sesinde, bir tür hürmetkârlık hissediliyor.{/n} "Yaşayan Azize Argenta, efendim ve adımı aldığım kişi. Kardeşlik, beni bu şekilde adlandırdı. Binlerce yıl önce kâfirler gemisine saldırıp düşmesine sebep oldu ve Azize Argenta vefat etti."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
